name: SOCIETY FOR MAINTENANCE & RELIABILITY PROFESSIONALS
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for H.R.3202 Cyber Vulnerabilities Disclosure Act
Addressing labor shortage of workers and workplace health & safety in the maintenance and reliability arena. This includes H.R.2353 - Strengthening Career and Technical Education for the 21st Century

Address the skills gap in manufacturing, specifically through H.R.2353 - Strengthening Career and Technical Education for the 21st Century Act
Advocate for STEM awareness in 6-12 grades
